name: A Curse Of Emptiness
description:
You find a cursed dungeon where a cursed wizard begs you to find the magic artefact in order to get him free.

The reward? a mystical treasure chest. Go get that artefact in those mostly... empty... rooms and get rich!

MiniJam 98

Theme: Empy

Limitation: Make it roguelite

The theme is the desesparatly empty dungeon as it would have already been looted by a lot of other players. The end of the story is the climax of the theme...

The roguelite aspect is the random generation of levels with random traps putted in the way of the player. A seed is draw and the level is created on that seed. The permadeath rollback the player at the start and a new seed will be drawn at the next try. 

Controls

  • Q & D to Move
  • Space to Jump
  • E to interact
